EmailTemplate.name: The Business Data Lake – an evolution in Data Infrastructure.Follow Up - Attende
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Joining Us
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: The Business Data Lake – an Evolution in Data Infrastructure We're glad you made it.
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Thank you for joining us yesterday for the fifth installment in our "What You Can Do With Hadoop" webinar series. This session featured Steve Jones, Senior Director of Big Data and Analytics of Capgemeni, and covered the evolution of data infrastructure. Please feel free to watch the on-demand replay here <http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotalvideo/The_Business_Data_Lake_an_evolution_in_Data_Infrastructure.m4v>.
Have you downloaded Pivotal HD yet? Learn more <http://www.gopivotal.com/products/pivotal-hd> about how you can maximize business value from all your data. Stay tuned for registration information for our February installment.
Have questions? Contact us <mailto:pivotal-operations@gopivotal.com>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Visit our blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/> Pivotal HD Community Forum Join Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/community/pivotal-hd>
